page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT.CALCOT,READING
page.content: Employment in the Calcot area is not the problem it is in other areas of the country.In fact Calcot is experiencing an influx of people from the North and Midlands,who are moving here to find work. Computers,one of the major growth industries,attracts many people,from experienced programmers and analysts to 'chip'makers and testers. The Savacentre hypermarket has provided much local work,and has greatly helped the unemployment situation in the West Reading area. Most people commute to work.Some undertaking quite long journies as far afield as London,Bristol,Bath and Oxford. The situation for young people is improving,with many choosing jobs in electronics,the motor trade,the building trade,and nursery nursing.
